alert.note: Alert for Southern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued November 19 at 10:15AM EST until November 20 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southern Erie county. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 1 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4249 7850 4296 7840 4301 7845 4290 7888 4279 7893 4232 7975 4199 7977 4202 7931 4208 7906 4230 7859 TIME Y22M11D20T0300Z-Y22M11D20T1200Z COORD...4239 7834 4246 7842 4256 7870 4258 7895 4251 7942 4232 7975 4199 7977 4199 7897 4199 7850 4205 7840 TIME Y22M11D20T1200Z-Y22M11D21T0300Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
